thread.title: Very Conveniently sited, comfortable accommodation with helpful and friendly staff
thread.title_full: Very Conveniently sited, comfortable accommodation with helpful and friendly staff - Review of Premier Inn London Stratford Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: GlassFanatic
title: Very Conveniently sited, comfortable accommodation with helpful and friendly staff
text: Visiting our daughter in London - needing some where to stay - able to get an early check in which enabled us to spend more of the day with her. This PI is right next to the Stratford Westfield shopping complex and about five minutes walk into the olympic park. Underground and overground lines within a couple of minutes walk makes this an ideal base for eating, shopping and travelling into central London. The PI provides comfortable functional rooms with wifi, tea & coffee facilities and well designed bathrooms. Lastly - parking - car park A is literally a couple of minutes walk from the hotel and charge around £7 a day midweek and £9.50 a day at weekends.
